channel.title: Latest Books, Top Book Authors and Popular Books in India | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Latest Books - Find the detailed information about Books and their Author name. Also find Most Popular Books in India and the World at Hindustan times.

image.title: Latest Books, Top Book Authors and Popular Books in India | Hindustan Times

item.title: Book Box: Create Your Home Library
item.description: Decide your library vibe, measure bookshelves to match, and create your reading sanctuary.

item.title: HT Picks; New Reads
item.description: This week’s list of interesting reads includes a book on Lata Mangeshkar, Keigo Higashino’s latest crime thriller, and a volume that traces the history of India’s reservation policy

item.title: Shobhaa De – “I frequently falter”
item.description: On her new memoir, Insatiable; My Hunger for Life, confronting uncomfortable truths, her equation with her family, reality TV, and the pervasiveness of politics

item.title: Review: The Blue Bar by Damayanti Biswas
item.description: A whodunit set in Mumbai that features a tortured police inspector trying to come to grips with his past even as he investigates a chilling new case

item.title: Shehan Karunatilaka – “Writing a queer novel was never my intention”
item.description: On his native Sri Lanka, queer rights, civil war, the hungry ghosts of Buddhist literature, and the inspiration behind the central character in his Booker Prize winning novel The Seven Moons of Maali Almeida

item.title: Report: Jaipur Literature Festival 2023
item.description: The 16th edition of the Jaipur Literature Festival saw everyone from the Nobel laureate Abdulrazak Gurnah and Booker prize winners in attendance and featured interesting sessions that included marginalized voices

item.title: Sanjeev Dutta: ‘A screenwriter may or may not help society but can destroy it’
item.description: The screenwriter of such popular films as Barfi and Life in a Metro talks about his professional journey, his collaborations, why he thinks writers can destroy society, and being influenced by Woody Allen
